text: this is believed to be the moment the
convoy was attacked more than a dozen
lorries filled with food for 78,000
people engulfed in flames this is the
Red House of the silly existence abroad
his house where's where more than 20
vehicles pretty truck full of wood this
video from the volunteer group the white
helmets claims to show the immediate
aftermath it describes how the convoy
was unloading supplies at a warehouse
when it was targeted unconfirmed reports
suggest at least 12 people including
some aid workers were killed the UN
Special m'boy / Syria has conveyed his
anger in a statement stephane de Mistura
said our outrage at this attack is
enormous the convoy was the outcome of a
long process of permission and
preparations to assist isolated
civilians
this attack came within hours of the
Syrian army announcing a week-long
ceasefire in Aleppo was over this attack
gives little hope to the civilians of
Aleppo still desperate for supplies and
a lasting peace Greg Dawson BBC News
